name: Shadow Child (Full Game)
description:
Shadow Child is a challenging puzzle action platformer that will bring many hours of difficult levels, challenges, and surprises. Spend time finishing and completing over 135 levels that get harder and harder as you move forward. 

REQUIREMENTS

  • Keyboard and mouse needed to play

CONTROLS

  • Use W,A,S,D or ARROWS used to move character. (W,A,S,D recommended).
  • Use mouse to place blocks that are used to create platforms and block obstacles.
